title: TU135: Holding Your Own Session 3 – Covert Narcissism (3rd in a Series)
description: When does self-consciousness and self-reflection cross the line into self-preoccupation?  Covert narcissism is also called thin-skinned, vulnerale, depressed or closet narcissism.  It's a real thing but unlike grandiosity, it's quite hard to spot!  Think about it - if you feel when you walk in a room everyone is looking at you - admiringly or judgmentally, either way - that is a narcissistic fantasy.  Today's episode follows the other side of grandiosity.  Find more here www.therapistuncensored.com/episodes
itunes:subtitle: Holding your own with challenging personalities - staying secure in relation with those high in narcissism (and breaking down the 3 types), "borderline" dynamics and anti-social personality traits.  This is session 3 in the series,
